Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a Kafka exporter class that can send items to different Kafka topics based on their type, with configurable topic mappings and data converters.

Class Description: KafkaItemExporter is a class that exports items to Kafka topics based on their type. It handles the connection to Kafka, message serialization, and routing items to appropriate topics using a configurable mapping.

Attributes:
- item_type_to_topic_mapping: [dict] - A dictionary mapping item types to Kafka topics
- converter: [CompositeItemConverter] - A converter for processing items before export
- connection_url: [str] - The Kafka bootstrap server connection URL
- producer: [KafkaProducer] - The Kafka producer instance for sending messages

Methods:
- __init__(output: str, item_type_to_topic_mapping: dict, converters: tuple = ()) -> None - Initializes the exporter with Kafka connection URL, topic mappings, and optional converters
- get_connection_url(output: str) -> str - Extracts the Kafka connection URL from the output parameter
- export_items(items: list) -> None - Exports multiple items to Kafka
- export_item(item: dict) -> None - Exports a single item to the appropriate Kafka topic based on its type
- close() -> None - Closes the producer (currently a no-op in reference implementation)
